title: Acer Predator 27" 144Hz LED IPS Computer Monitor XB271HUBMIPRZ - Overview
description:
Acer Predator 27 Black LED IPS Computer Monitor - XB271HUBMIPRZ
http://www.abt.com/product/100715/Acer-Predator-27-Black-LED-IPS-Computer-Monitor-XB271HUBMIPRZ.html?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=XB271HUBMIPRZ_20160517

Specifications:
Technical
• Number of Screens: 1
• Response Time: 4ms
• Panel Technology: In-plane Switching (IPS) Technology
• Swivel Angle: Yes
• Tilt Angle: -5°to35°
• Adjustable Display Height: Yes
• Maximum Adjustable Height: 5
Video
• Maximum Resolution: 2560 x 1440
• Color Supported: 16.7 Million Colors
• Contrast Ratio: 1000:1
• Brightness: 350 Nit
Display & Graphics
• Screen Size: 27
• Screen Mode: WQHD
• Backlight Technology: LED
• Screen Resolution: 2560 x 1440
• Aspect Ratio: 16:9
Audio
• Speakers: Yes
• Number of Speakers: 2 (2 watts per speaker)
• Speaker Output Mode: Stereo
Interfaces/Ports
• HDMI: 1
• DisplayPort: Yes
• USB 3.0: 4
• VESA Mount Compatible: Yes
